---
title: "Examine the values thoroughly"
output: html_document 
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggpubr)
```

```{r}
all <- read_csv('../data/!question/all_97_cor.csv')  %>% 
  rename(Protein_g = Proteing_g)

# all the distinct values
unique_combi <- all %>% 
  select(Food_NSC: Sodium_mg) %>% 
  distinct() %>% 
  arrange(Food_NSC, Unit)
  
     
```

```{r}
# check the biggest portion for each food_nsc and unit combination
big_portion <- unique_combi %>% 
  arrange(Food_NSC, Unit, -Por_eaten) %>% 
  group_by(Food_NSC, Unit) %>% 
  slice(1)
```
